name: Home-IOT
description: home-IOT (Home Internet of Things) is a new generation of IoT smart home security system independently developed by WiFly-City Taiwan Wireless City. The integrated design integrates the smart appliance control/alarm security system/environmental temperature control system and remote video surveillance on a single IPCAM host (IPC-9860MA). Not only greatly reduces the installation cost and complexity of use, but also effectively improves the stability of the system. Compared with the general smart home solution, it has obvious advantages in cost and ease of use; the unique contextual design of intelligent security and smart home breaks the barrier between traditional security and smart home systems that cannot be effectively integrated. Combining these independent security monitoring systems with the smart home system, the most complete green energy situation control and security alarm linkage use scheme has been realized.  The home-IOT (Home Internet of Things) system is highly integrated and powerful, but with simple and friendly use, all users can easily enjoy the new IoT era with the lowest cost and the highest price/performance ratio. Comfortable, safe, convenient and green living environment!!
